2.title: The Gift of Forgiveness

episode of.title: The Gift w/ Lakara Foster (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

2.plot: In "The Gift of Forgiveness", Lakara introduces us to artists from The Brown Sugar Vibe and gives award winning spoken word artist and actor Kendal Turner a reading that could change her life.

3.title: The Gift of Freedom

episode of.title: The Gift w/ Lakara Foster (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

3.plot: Lakara uses "The Gift" to speak with award winning spoken word and live music artist Ken J. Martin in an effort to connect him with one of his best friends who passed away earlier this year.

4.title: Facing the Gift

episode of.title: The Gift w/ Lakara Foster (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

4.plot: Lakara visits Marquita at Pure Bella Spa in Atlanta to get a facial and ends up revealing the truth about her father's death.

5.title: Stir Up the Gift

episode of.title: The Gift w/ Lakara Foster (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

5.plot: Lakara uses her Gift to connect her friend Tonya "Cheffy" Morris to her beloved grandmother as she teaches her how to cook a signature stir fry meal.

imdb.title: The Gift w/ Lakara Foster
akas: The Gift w/ Lakara Foster (United States)
plot: In this first episode of The Gift, Lakara and her friends visit Mia's gift wrap boutique to work on their gift wrapping skills...what starts off as an ordinary day turns into something extraordinary for one member of the crew.::Lakara Foster
